Title: Primr (retired)
Description: I began building Primr to support my community outreach work as part of the Gender Journeys programming I help with east of Toronto. It is an intelligent group-messaging system that uses SMS. There is no app to install, no smartphone required, provides cell phone number privacy, and can help reach youth and underprivileged communities like no other technology. Check out the website, or drop me a line to talk about a trial.

Title: TRCA Living City Explorer (retired)
Description: Great opportunity to leverage geospatial support in PostgreSQL, explore a way to create a web technology that is both stand-alone and embeddable.

Title: Continuous Coaching
Description: Continuous Coaching is a platform for coaches to gather their thoughts, build and sell program materials to coachees, and perform research activities on the data they collect in their coaching work.
